author: Portafolio
title: Ocho trabajos de medio tiempo con flexibilidad y buena remuneración | Empleo | Economía | Portafolio
text:
La flexibilidad en el trabajo es una de las cuestiones más valoradas en estos tiempos. Poder cumplir con las tareas desde cualquier parte del mundo o incluso en el horario que uno quiere parece no tener precio, y cada vez más compañías ofrecen esta modalidad . Por eso, la plataforma de búsqueda de empleo Flex Jobs elaboró un listado con algunas de las mejores oportunidades con flexibilidad y buena remuneración. 1- Abogado corporativo : estos profesionales se encargan del proceso legal en la formación y operación de las empresas. El pago medio es de 65,26 dólares por hora .
(Vea: Las mejores páginas para encontrar trabajo remoto en español, según especialista )
2- Director ejecutivo : como líder de una organización sin fines de lucro, el trabajo se centrará en juntar fondos o coordinar la administración. De media, pagan hasta 85 dólares la hora.
3- Director financiero : este tipo de trabajadores funcionan como un puente entre los sectores de finanzas y el liderazgo de proyectos. El pago medio es de 67, 21 dólares la hora.
4- Gerente de fondos : gestionar todos los aspectos del proceso para reunir fondos y organizar eventos para los donantes son algunas de las tareas a cumplir. De media, se pueden recibir 60,40 dólares por hora .
Trabajo remoto Trabajo remoto. FOTO: iStock 5- Gerente de Recursos Humanos : se encarga de las cuestiones ligadas con los empleados, desde la selección de personal hasta la adjudicación de los beneficios. El pago medio es de 65,67 dólares por hora .
6- Gerente de Mercadeo : se carga de monitorear y armar las campañas de mercadeo online, siempre alineando todo a los objetivos de la compañía. De media, pagan 66,70 dólares por hora . 7- Director médico : se dedica a ejecutar políticas, sistemas y agendas. Además, tiene que gestionar a otros profesionales como físicos y enfermeros. Hay 50,40 dólares de pago medio . (Vea: Los cinco perfiles de trabajo remoto mejor pagos en el mundo, según ChatGPT )
8- Enfermera : con educación de posgrado, pueden examinar pacientes, diagnosticar enfermedades y prescribir medicamentos. Ofrece un pago medio de 60,53 dólares la hora . Para más información, se puede visitar el sitio de Flex Jobs, donde hay en total 20 ofertas laborales de este tipo. contenido patrocinado Nuevo nombramiento de Galán para Bogotá: elige a Jorge Beltrán como secretario jurídico Destacados

author: @diariodorio
title: No sábado, Maracanãzinho recebe 'CelebraRio - I Evangelizar é Preciso', com o Padre Reginaldo Manzontti - Diário do Rio de Janeiro
text:
Mesmo com inscrições esgotadas há um mês, o CelebraRio – I Evangelizar é Preciso segue movimentando fiéis católicos do Rio de Janeiro, de todo o Brasil e residentes em outros países. O encontro acontece neste sábado (26), a partir do meio-dia, no Maracanãzinho, na Zona Norte. Para contemplar todos os fiéis, o encontro será transmitido ao vivo pela Rede Evangelizar de Comunicação (TV, rádio e plataformas digitais) e pelo canal do Youtube do Padre Manzotti Oficial, veiculando mensagens de intensa espiritualidade, testemunhos de fé, música e celebrações.
Ao meio-dia será rezado o Terço Mariano. Em seguida os padres Fábio Escobar, Adair e Jorge Carreira oficiam orações e pregações no ato da Renovação Carismática Católica (RCC RJ). Às 14 horas, a Banda DOM sobe ao palco do Maracanãzinho para animar o público com os seus sucessos. Após o show, o Padre Jorjão apresenta testemunhos sobre Guido Schäffer.
Às 15 horas, a Associação Evangelizar É Preciso reza o Terço de Jesus das Santas Chagas, sob a orientação do Padre Jorge Fortunato. O Ministério Evangelizar É Preciso segue a programação animando os católicos.
Às 16h, terá início a celebração da Santa Missa, ministrada pelo Padre Reginaldo Manzotti. O ato será seguido da Adoração ao Santíssimo Sacramento. Na sequência, o religioso apresenta o seu show de evangelização através da música em comemoração aos 100 anos do Rádio no Brasil e aos 20 anos do programa Experiência de Deus.
Parceria Solidária
Como em outras edições do “Evangelizar é Preciso”, as pessoas que participam presencialmente do encontro são convidadas a fazerem doação de sangue e levar um quilo de alimento não perecível para doação. Os mantimentos serão repassados a instituições parceiras da RCC RJ.
Inclusão Social
A Renovação Carismática Católica, a Comissão da Pessoa com Deficiência (Alerj) e a Subsecretaria de Políticas Inclusivas do Estado do Rio de Janeiro fecharam uma parceria para a conscientização da sociedade sobre a importância da inclusão e do respeito às pessoas com deficiência. O “Evangelizar É Preciso – Padre Reginaldo Manzotti” contará com todo o suporte de acessibilidade, desde rampas, elevadores e banheiros adaptados, até a acessibilidade comunicacional, com intérpretes de Libras; além de abafadores auditivos e sala sensorial, para autistas.
Confira a programação completa:
12h00 – Abertura dos portões
12h10 – Terço Mariano com Diácono Melquisedec
12h50 – Momento Carismático com RCC
(Padre Fábio Escobar, Padre Adair e Padre Jorge Carreira)
14h00 – Show com Banda DOM
14h45 – Testemunho sobre Guido Schäffer com Padre Jorjão
15h00 – Terço de Jesus das Santas Chagas
15h45 – Ministério Evangelizar
16h00 – Santa Missa com Padre Reginaldo Manzotti
17h30 – Adoração ao Santíssimo Sacramento
18h30 – Show especial
20h00 – Encerramento

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Google's Gemini AI Features Are Coming To Oppo And OnePlus Phones
text:
Major smartphone brands Oppo and OnePlus recently joined hands with Google to bring its latest artificial intelligence (AI) model Gemini 1.0 Ultra to its smartphones. Both Oppo and OnePlus are also planning to launch Gemini-powered smartphones later this year. Gemini on smartphones promises to completely change the way users interact with their devices.
Nicole Zhang, General Manager of AI Product for Oppo and OnePlus, also announced the launch of several Generative AI models for customers in China. These models are available to over ten million users of devices like the Oppo Find X7 and OnePlus 12, allowing them to access AI-generated content anytime, anywhere.
"By collaborating with Google to integrate both Gemini and Google Cloud AI into smartphones, and by forming alliances with other industry pioneers for a variety of AI experiences, we are thrilled to ambitiously broaden the scope of mobile AI innovations," Zhang said in a statement.
At the event, the smartphone manufacturers talked about the many ways AI can benefit mobile users. Nicole mentioned four important qualities she thinks AI on phones should have: it should use resources well, learn on its own, understand the real world, and inspire creativity in users.
The companies also confirmed that they will be working to build the perfect mix of hardware, operating system, and ecosystem to help AI flourish. Further, Oppo and OnePlus are already working with a range of partners to deliver AI experiences to their users, including AI Eraser.
Recently, OnePlus launched a new AI Eraser feature for its smartphones. This feature, powered by OnePlus' special large language model (LLM), makes editing images easier and more intuitive. The AI Eraser is available on OnePlus devices, including the OnePlus 12, OnePlus 12R, OnePlus 11, OnePlus Open and OnePlus Nord CE 4.
AI Eraser is a tool that helps you easily delete things you don't want in your pictures. For example, if there are people or trash in the background, you can select them, and AI Eraser will automatically remove them and fill in the background so it looks natural. It makes your photos look perfect without any extra effort.

author: Kirby McInerney LLP
title: Kirby McInerney LLP Reminds Biogen, Inc. (BIIB) Investors
text: NEW YORK, June 13, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The law firm of Kirby McInerney LLP reminds investors that a class action lawsuit has been filed in the U.S. District Court for the District of Colorado on behalf of those who acquired Biogen, Inc (“Biogen” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: BIIB) securities during the period of February 3, 2022 through February 13, 2024, inclusive (“the Class Period”). Investors have until July 22, 2024 to apply to the Court to be appointed as lead plaintiff in the lawsuit. [Click here to learn more about the class action ] On November 8, 2023, Biogen negatively revised non-GAAP diluted EPS guidance for fiscal year 2023 in a range of $14.50 to $15.00 per share, significantly below its previous guidance of fiscal year 2023 non-GAAP diluted EPS of $15.00 to $16.00 per share, citing approximately $0.75 of dilution from its acquisition of Reata. On this news, price of Biogen shares declined by $13.92 per share to close at $231.69 per share on November 8, 2023. On January 8, 2024, Biogen’s CEO Christopher A. Viehbacher discussed challenges with the launch of Leqembi, a treatment the Company was developing for Alzheimer’s disease, and walked back prior expectations of having 10,000 patients on the drug by the end of March 2024. On this news, the price of Biogen shares declined by $10.77 per share over three consecutive trading days to close at $247.21 per share on January 11, 2024. On February 6, 2024, news reports emerged that Eisai, Biogen’s development partner, was facing challenges with the launch of Leqembi and that only 2,000 patients in the U.S. had been administered the drug. On this news, the price of Biogen shares declined by $5.01 per share to close at $240.54 per share on February 7, 2024. Then, on February 13, 2024, Biogen announced its fourth quarter and fiscal year 2023 results, including Q4 non-GAAP EPS of $2.95, missing consensus estimates by $0.23, and Q4 revenue of $2.4 billion, missing consensus estimates by $60 million and representing a 5.5%, year-over-year decline. Biogen disclosed that Q4 “GAAP and Non-GAAP diluted EPS [was] negatively impacted by $0.35 related to [the] previously disclosed closeout costs for ADUHELM,” confirmed that Biogen had “approximately 2,000 patients on [Leqembi] at the moment,” and that it had “an indication that there are about 3,800 patients as of last week on the registry” – significantly less than the 10,000-patient goal set by Biogen and Eisai for the end of following month, according to the complaint. On this news, the price of Biogen shares declined by $18.09 per share to close at $226.65 per share on February 13, 2024 On February 14, 2024, Biogen disclosed in an SEC filing that it had received a subpoena from the DOJ “seeking information relating to [Biogen’s] business operations in several foreign countries” and that “[t]he Company is also providing information relating to [its] business operations in several foreign countries to the SEC.” On this news, Biogen’s stock price fell $5.91 per share, or 2.61%, to close at $220.74 per share on February 14, 2024. The lawsuit alleges throughout the Class Period, the Company made false and/or misleading statements and/or failed to disclose that: (i) Biogen had overstated its efforts to enhance its compliance controls; (ii) accordingly, Biogen maintained inadequate compliance controls and procedures in connection with its business operations in foreign countries; (iii) Biogen and/or its employees were engaged in unlawful or improper conduct in foreign countries; (iv) the foregoing subjected the Company to a heightened risk of governmental and/or regulatory scrutiny and enforcement action, as well as significant legal, financial, and reputational harm; (v) Biogen overstated the strength of its AD-related product portfolio, including the Company's and Eisai's efforts and success in launching and providing access to Leqembi; (vi) Biogen also downplayed the negative impact that the Reata Acquisition would have on its FY 2023 non-GAAP diluted EPS; and (vii) all the foregoing were likely to have a significant negative impact on Biogen's 2023 results. If you purchased or otherwise acquired Biogen securities, have information, or would like to learn more about this investigation, please contact Thomas W. Elrod of https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=fXW1oaSP6E2nvSKf1CbcnDwneZszIR7_c76jf7L-A7Aij5wSDKyHneFgc5-fK-E-jH0fDHwp_rWk0yr4K6-BMg== by email at investigations@kmllp.com , or by filling out this CONTACT FORM , to discuss your rights or interests with respect to these matters without any cost to you. https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=fXW1oaSP6E2nvSKf1CbcnDgN0qd3zffBeQcNZTu9L3BH6Kq0OfX1dP_Uv2wZ6XxAO0EwJ6djbG54wlnblYlW1KjMz85ykY1wywPzPb52ntA= is a New York-based plaintiffs’ law firm concentrating in securities, antitrust, whistleblower, and consumer litigation. The firm’s efforts on behalf of shareholders in securities litigation have resulted in recoveries totaling billions of dollars. Additional information about the firm can be found at Kirby McInerney LLP’s website . This press release may be considered Attorney Advertising in some jurisdictions under the applicable law and ethical rules. Contacts Kirby McInerney LLP Thomas W. Elrod, Esq. 212-699-1180 https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=YP7nZOH9__0zRKtBasn1l5zUNYzRp63fbuhj8NaYjPEq7XD5j_k9CdMhyq-MNoHvz_SMiupJCZbPIP2g8nw1jOf4NmbFEI6Z6zpBCDjevEU= https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=1SSNLCheBYFCpb9nh9ura7NX-VIX_GFPdZsP7o0vgHtYUcXAkK3e0Tf1e3DfcKUSd7r7wJmAwlw9MBsAa8xclwDY_WPt31N1ZR5gdJT6uWWDN7QR0gwaeMfw_EAu_bOy

author: Alex Hargrave
title: Improved aerial firefighting base opens in north-central Wyoming
text: By Alex Hargrave,2 hours ago By Alex Hargrave,2 hours ago Read in NewsBreak [Jackson, WY](/jackson-wy)12 days ago [Wyoming State](/wyoming-state)1 day ago Utah hiker, 19, who inadvertently filmed her own death after setting up phone to record beside river she drowned in is identified [Utah State](/utah-state)10 days ago [Montana State](/montana-state)2 days ago [New Mexico State](/new-mexico-state)2 days ago [California State](/california-state)7 days ago [Shenandoah, PA](/shenandoah-pa)27 days ago Welcome to NewsBreak, an open platform where diverse perspectives converge. It’s essential to note our commitment to transparency: our Terms of Use acknowledge that our services may not always be error-free, and our Community Standards emphasize our discretion in enforcing policies.
